notesStmt.note: Incomplete. Folios 66-68 are more or less mutilated.
Prefixed is a printed vellum leaf from Ṿa-yikhal, and affixed is another from Peḳude, belonging to Ḥumash ve-targum Onḳelos ῾im perush Rash"i ve-Ramban, Salonica 1520.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Perush Seder mo῾ed פרוש סדר מועד

collation.p: Currently the volume begins with the 5th leaf of the 5th quire and ends with the 6th leaf of the 14th quire. One leaf is missing after folio 36, five leaves after folio 51 and four after folio 67.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 15th century.
